html:
SALES INVOICE / SHIPPING MANIFEST

PLEASE USE PERMANENT INK FOR ALL ITEMS

INVOICE/MANIFEST NUMBER: {% set invoices = [] %} {% for item in doc.items if item.against_sales_invoice %} {% if item.against_sales_invoice not in invoices %} {% set __ = invoices.append(item.against_sales_invoice) %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {{ ",".join(invoices) }}
SALES ORDER/DELIVERY NOTE: {% set orders = [] %} {% for item in doc.items if item.against_sales_order %} {% if item.against_sales_order not in orders %} {% set __ = orders.append(item.against_sales_order) %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {{ ",".join(orders) }} / {{ doc.name }}
ACTUAL DATE/TIME OF DEPARTURE: {{ doc.lr_date or "" }}
ESTIMATED DATE/TIME OF ARRIVAL: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Delivery Stop", {"delivery_note": doc.name}, "estimated_arrival") or "" }}
SHIPPER INFORMATION
STATE LICENSE # {{ frappe.db.get_value("Compliance Info", frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "license"), "license_number") or "" }}
TYPE OF LICENSE {{ frappe.db.get_value("Compliance Info", frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "license"), "license_type") or "" }}
BUSINESS NAME {{ doc.company or "" }}
BUSINESS ADDRESS {{ frappe.db.get_value("Address", {"is_your_company_address": 1}, "address_line1") or "" }}
CITY, STATE, ZIP CODE {{ frappe.db.get_value("Address", {"is_your_company_address": 1}, "city") or "" }} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Address", {"is_your_company_address": 1}, "state") or "" }} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Address", {"is_your_company_address": 1}, "pincode") or "" }}
PHONE NUMBER {{ frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "phone_no") or "" }}
CONTACT NAME {{ frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "contact_name") or "" }}
RECEIVER INFORMATION
STATE LICENSE # {{ frappe.db.get_value("Compliance Info", frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer, "license"), "license_number") or "" }}
TYPE OF LICENSE {{ frappe.db.get_value("Compliance Info", frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer, "license"), "license_type") or "" }}
BUSINESS NAME {{ doc.customer_name or "" }}
DELIVERY ADDRESS {{ frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.shipping_address_name, "address_line1") or "" }}
CITY, STATE, ZIP CODE {{ frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.shipping_address_name, "city") or "" }} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.shipping_address_name, "state") or "" }} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.shipping_address_name, "pincode") or "" }}
PHONE NUMBER {{ frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.shipping_address_name, "phone") or "" }}
CONTACT NAME {{ frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer, "customer_primary_contact") or "" }}
DISTRIBUTOR INFORMATION
STATE LICENSE # {{ frappe.db.get_value("Compliance Info", frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "license"), "license_number") or "" }} DRIVER'S NAME {{ doc.driver_name or "" }}
BUSINESS NAME {{ doc.company or "" }} CA DRIVER'S LIC. # {{ frappe.db.get_value("Driver", doc.driver, "license_number") or "" }}
STREET ADDRESS {{ frappe.db.get_value("Address", {"is_your_company_address": 1}, "address_line1") or "" }} VEHICLE MAKE {{ frappe.db.get_value("Vehicle", doc.vehicle_no, "make") or "" }}
CITY, STATE, ZIP {{ frappe.db.get_value("Address", {"is_your_company_address": 1}, "city") or "" }} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Address", {"is_your_company_address": 1}, "state") or "" }} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Address", {"is_your_company_address": 1}, "pincode") or "" }} VEHICLE MODEL {{ frappe.db.get_value("Vehicle", doc.vehicle_no, "model") or "" }}
PHONE NUMBER {{ frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "phone_no") or "" }} VEHICLE LIC. PLATE # {{ frappe.db.get_value("Vehicle", doc.vehicle_no, "name") or "" }}
CONTACT NAME {{ frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "contact_name") or "" }} ACTUAL TIME OF ARR.:

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

{{ tax.description }} {% if tax.rate %} (@{{ tax.rate }}%) {% endif %}: {{ tax.get_formatted("tax_amount", doc) }}
TOTAL: {{ doc.get_formatted("grand_total", doc) }}
PRODUCT RECEIPT CONFIRMATION
I CONFIRM THAT THE CONTENTS OF THIS SHIPMENT MATCH IN WEIGHT AND COUNT AS INDICATED ABOVE. I AGREE TO TAKE CUSTODY OF ALL ITEMS AS INDICATED RECEIVED ABOVE – AND WHICH ARE NOT CIRCLED. THE PRODUCTS CIRCLED ABOVE ARE REJECTED FOR DELIVERY AND REMAIN IN THE CUSTODY OF THE DISTRIBUTOR FOR RETURN TO THE SHIPPER AS INDICATED ON THIS FORM AND ALL ATTACHED PRODUCT DETAILS SHEET(S).

SIGNATURE OF PERSON RECEIVING AND/OR REJECTING PRODUCT: DATE SIGNED:
